name: Enchant js simple particle
body:
### overview
This is a particle sample usign enchant.js, html5, canvas and bootstrap.

### demo URL
http://samples-obi.dotcloud.com/

### recommended browsers
chrome and safari runs fast, firefox runs slow and IE doesn't work.

### form explain(from left to right)
node's color(e.g., #FFFFFF)

node's horizon number

node's vertical number

node's size

particle number when node explodes.
tagline: simple particle sample with enchant.js + html5 + canvas + bootstrap
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
